name: UpdatePurchaseOrderComment
description:
Update an existing comment on a purchase order.

Use this tool to update a specific comment on a purchase order in Zoho Books. It should be called when you need to modify or correct information in a comment related to a purchase order.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID representing the organization in Zoho Books.

parameters.name: purchase_order_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the purchase order to be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the purchase order.

parameters.name: comment_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the comment to be updated in the purchase order.

parameters.name: comment_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the updated comment description and expected delivery date. Include 'description' for the comment text and 'expected_delivery_date' in YYYY-MM-DD format.

expected_delivery_date.description: The expected delivery date when the goods or services ordered in this purchase order should be received. This date is used for planning, scheduling, and tracking deliveries. It helps in managing inventory, coordinating with vendors, and ensuring timely receipt of ordered items. The date should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
